attributes.action: Provide homeless people with a place to stay in hotels and food from caterers.
attributes.additional_details: There are hundreds of thousands of homeless people who can not self isolate and are at extreme risk from the pandemic, please provide them with shelter and food, from the empty hotels.
attributes.background: Please provide homeless, one of the most at risk groups of people, with shelter and food, to protect them from Covid-19.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302485

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
